title: on me by section 519C(1) of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (No. 39 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (Section
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (Section 

519C(1)) (Prescribed Persons) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited tax consolidation act 1997 (section 519c(1)) (prescribed persons) order 2020

title: on me by section 519C(1) of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (No. 39 of 1997),
heading: 2. The following persons are prescribed as qualifying savings institutions
text_raw:
2. The following persons are prescribed as qualifying savings institutions 
under paragraph (i) of the definition of “qualifying savings institution” in section 
519C(1) of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997 (No. 39 of 1997): 

(a) Yorkshire Building Society; 

(b) Barclays Bank UK PLC. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 September, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th September, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [357] 3
